contentList.content: LCC Developer Spells
Holds developer tools to make it easier to test LCC
Reboost
Forces the target to recaclulate all its LCC boosts
Unboost
Forces the (boosted) target to drop all its LCC boosts
Boost
Forces the (unboosted) target to try to compute all its LCC boosts
Mass Reboost
Up to [1] entities are forced to recaclulate all their LCC boosts
Mass Unboost
Up to [1] (boosted) entities are forced to drop all their LCC boosts
Mass Boost
Up to [1] (unboosted) entities try to compute all their LCC boosts
All Reboost
Forces all entities to recaclulate all their LCC boosts
All Unboost
Forces all (boosted) entities to drop all their LCC boosts
All Boost
Forces all (unboosted) entities to try to compute all their LCC boosts
Info to Console
Prints full guid and short guid to Script Console
